name: INITIALIZE_GUARDIANS
description:
SOMETHING THAT NEEDS TO BE PROTECTED

As the player, your goal is defeat waves of enemies before they reach the end of the map and deplete all of the Cores. To accomplish this task you will join forces with Subjects, mystical guardians created with Aura able to become more powerful by unleashing their powers.

SUBJECT IMPROVEMENT JOURNEY

By attacking, producing Aura or performing their signature action, Subjects gain experience and increase their level. After a certain amount of experience they are able to Evolve and transform into a new form, unlocking new abilities or improving characteristics like damage, fire rate or range.

WORLD MAP DIVERSITY

Explore a world with 13 different type of biomes, each of them presents 3 maps with different layouts and environment. More Subjects are unlocked gradually by completing the game Main Campaign.

A GREATER CHALLENGE LIES AT THE END

Additional challenges and game modes are unlocked by completing the Main Campaign, including a Sandbox Mode where you can design enemy waves and test new strategies.
